## Public Member Functions

### destroy() {#a60e0da8cb1cac614df18ebb7ad458f3e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void MCFragment::destroy ()">
Destroys the current fragment.

This must be used instead of delete as <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfragment">MCFragment</a> is non-virtual. This method will dispatch to the appropriate subclass.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcfragment-h/#l00093">93</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcfragment-h">MCFragment.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mcfragment-cpp/#l00031">31</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mcfragment-cpp">MCFragment.cpp</a>.

  prototype="bool llvm::MCFragment::hasInstructions () const"

Does this fragment have instructions emitted into it?

### AllowAutoPadding {#a9f7041d4aa87ae600ae5b28a4096dd9b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::MCFragment::AllowAutoPadding"
